DOC.brief_summary: This is a Registry that invites patients undergoing colorectal surgery for colorectal cancer. Epidemiological data is collected. The Registry includes tumor tissue and blood banks for analyzing different genetic mutations and disease-specific biomarkers.
DOC.brief_title: Epidemiological and Molecular Colorectal Cancer Registry
DOC.criteria: Adult patients undergoing colorectal surgery for colorectal cancer. Unwillingness to participate.
